casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Lequan FOX No. 72P17-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018. Lequan Fox, For Fox, Lequan. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 4th of October 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Wake County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
